description: Astronomers have captured the first image of two supermassive black holes orbiting in quasar OJ 287. The smaller black hole’s jet spirals due to gravitational forces from the larger one. This discovery validates dual-core theories and opens doors for research on gravitational waves and galaxy evolution.
title: Astronomers Capture First Image of Two Supermassive Black Holes Orbiting Each Other

description: Astronomers using a global radio telescope array have detected the smallest known pure dark matter clump, roughly a million times the Sun’s mass. Found through a faint gravitational distortion in an Einstein ring, it offers new insight into how dark matter halos form across the universe.
title: Astronomers Detect Smallest Known Clump of Pure Dark Matter Using Gravitational Lensing

description: #Love is a highly anticipated Tamil romantic series on Netflix. Directed by Balaji Mohan and produced by Soundarya Rajinikanth, it stars Arjun Das and Aishwarya Lekshmi. The story explores the challenges of love and compatibility in modern relationships, blending humor, drama, and emotional depth for a fresh audience experience.
title: #Love OTT Release: New Tamil-Language Romance Series to Premiere on Netflix

description: A new study in Acta Astronautica warns that Low Earth Orbit is becoming dangerously congested. Since 2019, the number of satellites performing more than ten collision-avoidance maneuvers per month has risen sevenfold. With nearly 25,000 tracked objects and more launches planned, scientists fear a chain-reaction risk and call for stronger global coordination in orbital management.
title: Rising Satellite Traffic in Low Earth Orbit Sparks Collision Risk Concerns

description: Researchers have developed a self-healing layer for all-solid-state lithium batteries, enhancing their safety, performance, and longevity. The innovation could power safer electric vehicles and sustainable grid storage while reducing manufacturing complexity.
title: Scientists Develop Self-Healing Technology for Safer, Longer-Lasting EV Batteries

description: Starship Flight 11 launched flawlessly from Starbase, Texas, marking the final test of SpaceX’s Starship V2 design. The mission validated new descent and heat-shield systems, setting the stage for the next-generation Starship V3 and future Artemis and Mars missions.
title: SpaceX’s Starship Flight 11 Marks Final Test of V2 Design With Successful Launch

description: F1-The Movie is a sports drama movie that follows a retired F1 racer named Sonny Hayes who is set to make a comeback by training a struggling team to win the World Championship. The film stars the talented Brad Pitt, Damson Idris, Javier Bardem, Kerry Condon, Tobias Menzies, and more. F1 The Movie will begin streaming on December 12, exclusively on Apple TV.
title: F1 The Movie OTT Release Date Is Out: Know When and Where to Watch Brad Pitt-Starrer Online

description: JPMorgan Chase is preparing to roll out cryptocurrency trading services, marking a major expansion of its digital-asset strategy. The bank’s global head of markets and digital assets, Scott Lucas, confirmed the move while clarifying that crypto custody is not yet part of its near-term plans. This development aligns with JPMorgan’s blockchain initiatives, including the JPM Deposit Token pilot, and follows a shift in CEO Jamie Dimon’s outlook toward stablecoins and blockchain technology.
title: JPMorgan Plans to Launch Crypto Asset Trading Services

description: Nothing has expanded its Essential Space app with the new Share Sheet feature, enabling users of the Phone 3, Phone 3a, and Phone 3a Pro to quickly save and organise content from articles, social media, music, and more via the Share feature. The Share Sheet installs automatically with updates or can be manually added via the Google Play Store. Accessible via the Essential Key, the hub also supports screenshots, photos, voice notes, call recordings, reminders, and collections. AI tools generate summaries and highlight key topics.
title: Nothing Phone Users Can Now Quickly 'Share' Any Content With Essential Space

description: Samsung reportedly patents self-healing screen technology and fingerprint sensor for foldables. The technology could debut in company's future foldable smartphones. The proposed structure can detect cracks, prevent damage, and heal sensitive areas, like in the camera cutouts and sensor regions. If implemented, the techonogly would pave way for a leap in foldable phone design.
title: Samsung Patent Document Hints at 'Self-Healing' Screen for Foldable Phones: Report

description: Vivo X300 Pro, powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, debuted in China on Monday, alongside the Vivo X300. The handset succeeds last year’s Vivo X200 Pro, which features a MediaTek Dimensity 9400 SoC. The new handset offers upgrades in terms of most aspects. It packs a 6,510mAh battery with 90W wired and 40W wireless fast charging support, while the Vivo X200 Pro carries a 6,000mAh battery. Both phones feature a similar triple-rear camera unit with a 200-megapixel telephoto sensor.
title: Vivo X300 Pro vs Vivo X200 Pro: Ultimate Specifications and Features Comparison

description: Aan Paavam Pollathathu is a Tamil rom-com movie that is set to release in theatres on Oct 31st, 2025. The movie features Rio Raj and Malavika Manoj in the lead roles. This movie is scheduled to release theatrically on Oct 31st, 2025. Also, JioHotstar has bagged the deal and has become its OTT streaming partner for post-theatrical release.
title: Aan Paavam Pollathatu OTT Release Details: Know When and Where to Watch Tamil Movie Online

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is now in its fourth week. It started on September 23 for everyone, giving discounts on various electronics like phones, smartwatches, true wireless stereo (TWS) headsets, home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, laptops, and smart TVs. The company has partnered with the HDFC Bank to offer an instant 10 percent discount on the credit and debit cards of the bank. However, buyers can get cashback on cards of other banks, too, on select products. People looking to buy a new ink tank printer can save up to Rs. 7,000 during the sale event.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: Best Deals on Ink Tank Printers From HP, Canon and More Brands

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Diwali Special Sale 2025 is currently live in India. The discount sale features eye-catching deals and offers on wireless power banks. They are listed with up to 80 percent discount. Shoppers can also avail bank discounts and exchange offers on select models. There are faster delivery options and coupon discounts.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: The Ultimate Deals on Wireless Power Banks You Shouldn’t Miss During Amazon's Sale

description: Bhutan is shifting its national digital identity system from Polygon to Ethereum, covering nearly 800,000 citizens. Ethereum integration is fully operational, enabling residents to verify credentials, access government services, and receive Verifiable Credentials (VCs). The move strengthens decentralisation, transparency, and resilience while demonstrating Bhutan’s leadership in blockchain adoption. The nation also maintains the fifth-largest Bitcoin holdings, using renewable hydropower for mining and strategic wallet management to reduce risk exposure.
title: Bhutan Migrates National ID System to Ethereum Blockchain

description: Instagram is going to follow the guidelines of PG-13 movie ratings when it comes to showing content to teen accounts. On Tuesday, the Meta-owned platform announced that teenagers under the age of 18 will be automatically placed into an updated 13+ setting, which they will not be able to opt out of without the permission of one of their parents.
title: Instagram Boosts Teen Safety, Sets PG-13 Content Limits for All New Teen Accounts

description: Written and directed by Jeethu Joseph, Mirage is a Malayalam crime thriller movie that is set to land on SonyLIV. It explores themes of conspiracy, crime, and a shady past. Co-written by Jeethu Joseph, Mirage features Aparna Balamurali and Asif Ali in the prominent roles. The film was theatrically released on Sept 19th, 2025.
title: Mirage to Release on OTT Platforms Soon: Everything You Need to Know About This Malayalam Crime Thriller Film

description: Nvidia has announced the DGX Spark, touted as the world’s smallest AI supercomputer, which will start shipping on October 15. Priced at $3,999 (roughly Rs. 3.5 lakh), it offers one petaflop of AI performance and 128GB of unified memory. Despite its compact size, Nvidia says it can train and fine-tune large AI models efficiently.
title: Nvidia DGX Spark Supercomputer With Grace Blackwell Chipset to Go on Sale Starting October 15

description: Key details of the upcoming OnePlus 15 have leaked online. The phone is said to feature a dual-cell 7,150mAh rated battery, which may have a typical value of 7,300mAh, with 100W or 120W wired fast charging and 50W wireless charging support. It may sport a 1.5K+ flat BOE display with a 165Hz refresh rate and launch in black, purple, and titanium colours. The OnePlus Ace 6 and Turbo models could feature 7,600mAh and 7,800mAh batteries, respectively.
title: OnePlus 15 Battery, Charging Specifications Leaked; Could Launch Soon

description: How to Train Your Dragon is now streaming on your digital screens. The movie explores themes of friendship, emotions, perception, and more. It was theatrically released on June 13th, 2025, where it received a remarkable response. It is available in multiple languages, including Hindi, English, Tamil, and Telugu on JioHotstar.
title: How To Train Your Dragon Now Streaming on OTT: Know When and Where to Watch the Live-Action Film Online

description: iQOO Z10R 5G debuted in Russia on October 6 with a different chipset, a higher capacity battery, and some other differences in terms of specifications. However, both phones sport similar displays and rear camera configurations. The phone was unveiled in India on July 24 in two colourways and three storage variants. However, in Russia, it is available in two RAM and storage configurations and colourways. The iQOO Z10R 5G carries a dual-rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel main sensor.
title: iQOO Z10R 5G With Dimensity 7360-Turbo Launched Months After Indian Variant Debuts: Price, Specifications

description: Moto G100 has been quietly launched in China, featuring a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset, a 7,000mAh battery with 33W fast charging, and Android 15-based Hello UI. It sports a 6.72-inch full-HD+ LCD panel with a 120Hz refresh rate, 1,050 nits brightness, and DC dimming. The phone includes a 50-megapixel Sony LYT-600 main camera, an 8-megapixel ultra-wide macro lens, and a 32-megapixel selfie camera. Other features include stereo speakers, an IP64 dust and splash-resistant rating, and a side fingerprint sensor.
title: Moto G100 (2025) Launched With 7,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 SoC: Price, Features

description: Samsung is expected to release the One UI 8.5 update early next year. The update, which will be based on Android 16 QPR2, is expected to come with a new Network Battery Saver feature. The feature could help users save battery when their phone is idle by managing network usage more efficiently. The feature could use Personal Data Intelligence to monitor activities.
title: Samsung's One UI 8.5 Update Could Introduce a Network Battery Saver Feature: Report

description: Android devices are susceptible to a new type of attack that can covertly steal two-factor authentication (2FA) codes, private messages, location timelines, and other data. Security researchers have devised this new attack, called Pixnapping, which can exploit loopholes and security flaws in Android without requiring any system permissions. As per a report, the malicious application can convert mapped pixel coordinates into alphanumeric characters or geometric shapes by exploiting a side channel.
title: Android Phones Susceptible to ‘Pixnapping’ Attack That Steals 2FA Codes, Messages and More, Researchers Say

description: Google Pixel 10 Pro XL debuted globally on August 20, alongside the Pixel 10 Pro and Pixel 10. All three phones in the latest Google lineup are powered by the proprietary Tensor G5 chip. However, over the weekend, several users of the recently launched phones started sharing their ordeal on social media platforms regarding an issue that has reportedly now been fixed. The apps on the Pixel 10 Pro series were found to be continuously crashing and freezing.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series App Crash Bug Reportedly Resolved via Server-Side Fix

description: The tax authorities have launched an extensive investigation into over 400 wealthy Binance users for possible tax evasion between 2022 and 2025. Officials are examining peer-to-peer trades and payments via banks, Google Pay, and cash. Binance’s re-entry in 2024, following a $2.25 million (Rs. 20 crore) fine and registration with the FIU, has given authorities access to user data, helping them identify suspicious activity and ensure compliance with India’s strict crypto tax regime.
title: Income Tax Department Said to Target Over 400 Wealthy Binance Traders in Major Tax Evasion Crackdown

description: The Nintendo Switch 2 version of Assassin's Creed Shadows has leaked again. The Switch 2 port of the game reportedly appeared in a now deleted listing on a French retailer's website. The listing reportedly confirmed that the game would be available as a Game-Key Card on the Switch 2.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Port of Assassin's Creed Shadows Leaks on French Retailer's Website

description: Slack has announced new AI-powered features aimed at creating an “agentic OS” experience. Integrating Salesforce tools such as Sales, IT, HR, and Tableau, Slack now enables users to perform AI-driven tasks within chats. The platform will also roll out an enterprise search API, allowing secure cross-platform data searches via a single interface.
title: Slack Integrates Natively Built Salesforce Interfaces Into Its Platform, Adds Agentic Capabilities

description: Vivo X300 Pro, powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9500, slightly outperforms the Xiaomi 17 Pro Max with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 in AnTuTu scores, leading in CPU and memory, while Xiaomi excels in GPU and UX. Despite both chips using TSMC’s 3nm process, the Dimensity 9500 is estimated to cost around 50 percent less than Qualcomm’s chip. With rising Snapdragon prices, MediaTek’s cheaper yet powerful alternative may attract more phone makers.
title: Vivo X300 Pro Tops Xiaomi 17 Pro Max on AnTuTu's CPU Test; Dimensity 9500 Reportedly Cheaper Than Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5

description: Bitcoin traded around $113,500 (roughly Rs. 1.01 crore) on Monday, consolidating after a volatile week marked by leverage unwinding. Analysts say the market reset could create a stronger foundation for recovery, with Ethereum steady above $4,000 (roughly Rs. 3.56 lakh). Investors are closely tracking Jerome Powell’s speech today, which may provide clarity on rate cuts and macroeconomic direction.
title: Bitcoin Price Slips to $113,500 as Traders Await US Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s Remarks

description: Honor MagicPad 3 Pro is confirmed to launch in India on October 15. Ahead of the event, Honor has confirmed the specifications of the tablet. The Android tablet with the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset will include a 13.3-inch screen and a 12,450mAh battery. It will be available in Floating Gold, Moon Shadow White, and Starry Gray colour options.
title: Honor MagicPad 3 Pro Confirmed to Launch With 12,450mAh Battery, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC

description: Microsoft has unveiled MAI-Image-1, its first in-house AI image generation model. The model debuted in the top 10 on LMArena’s text-to-image leaderboard and will soon be integrated into Microsoft products like Copilot and Bing Image Creator. It follows MAI-Voice-1 and focuses on producing photorealistic, fast-rendering visuals.
title: Microsoft Introduces MAI-Image-1, Its First Natively Developed Image Generation AI Model

description: Google has started rolling out the AI-powered makeup effects on Google Meet for web and mobile. This feature allows users to apply virtual foundation, blush, and lipstick. There are 12 new studio makeup looks, and the preference of the user will be saved for the next meeting.  The rollout started on October 8, and it is likely to reach all the supported accounts within 15 days
title: Google Meet Now Lets You Apply AI-Powered Makeup Effects During Video Calls

description: Apple has announced that it is rebranding its video streaming service, Apple TV+, to “simply” Apple TV, dropping the “+” sign. The company revealed the same, without giving any further details, as part of the global streaming debut announcement of Apple Original Film ‘F1 The Movie’, starring Brad Pitt and directed by Joseph Kosinski. However, the Cupertino tech giant did not articulate its reason for the rebranding bid. After this, Apple has three products with the same name. The Apple TV app, Apple TV smart TV device, and Apple TV streaming service.
title: Apple TV+ Rebranded to Apple TV as Company Brings F1 the Movie to Streaming Platform

description: Google, on Tuesday, announced that it will invest $15 billion (1.3 lakh crore) in India to set up an artificial intelligence (AI)-focused data centre. Google Cloud CEO Thomas Kurian confirmed that this data centre will be built in Andhra Pradesh’s port city, Visakhapatnam. The investment will be made over a period of the next five years.
title: Google to Invest $15 Billion to Set Up AI-Focused Data Centre in India

description: Users can now quickly generate webpage summaries through the Gemini overlay in Chrome for Android, following its initial launch last month in Chrome for Mac and Windows for US users. The Summarise Pages option appears above the Gemini prompt bar, between Share Screen with Live and Ask About Page. Selecting it produces a floating summary window, expandable with follow-up questions or read-aloud options. Powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash, the shortcut works across Chrome, Custom Tabs, Search, Discover, and Google News, streamlining summarisation without manual link pasting.
title: Google Updates Gemini With Support for Instantly Summarising Webpages in Chrome for Android

description: iQOO is gearing up to launch the iQOO 15 in China, which will succeed last year's iQOO 13. It is teased to feature an 8K vapour chamber (VC) Dome cooling system. The setup will include a double layer of ultra-high thermal conductivity graphite. It is claimed to deliver a 47 percent improvement in cooling performance over the previous generation.
title: iQOO 15 Confirmed to Feature 8K VC Ice Dome Cooling System, Warhammer MAX Dual-Axis Motor

description: Noise Master Buds Max was unveiled in India on Tuesday as the tech firm’s new over-the-ear headphones. The Master Buds Max are currently available via the company website in three colourways. Customers can also buy the new headphones via Amazon, Reliance Digital, Croma, and Vijay Sales with introductory offers. It has been developed in collaboration with Sound by Bose.
title: Noise Master Buds Max Launched in India With Sound by Bose, Active Noise Cancellation: Price, Specifications

description: Nothing Phone 3a Lite is in development, according to a report. The handset is expected to be introduced as an affordable version of the Nothing Phone 3, sitting below the model in the company's lineup. It is reported to come in a single 8GB RAM and 128GB storage variant, and may be offered in black and white colourways.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite Launch Timeline, Memory Configuration and Colourways Leaked

description: OpenAI has entered a multi-year partnership with Broadcom to co-develop custom AI accelerators capable of delivering up to 10 gigawatts of computing power. Under the deal, OpenAI will design the chips while Broadcom handles fabrication and networking. The move marks OpenAI’s second hardware venture, following its collaboration with Jony Ive on an AI device.
title: OpenAI, Broadcom Announce Partnership to Jointly Design and Develop AI Chips

description: The Oppo Reno 15 and Reno 15 Pro are expected to go official in China soon and key specifications of the handsets have now been tipped. As per a tipster, the Reno 15 models will be powered by a Dimensity 8000 series chip. Both handsets are tipped to sport 1.5K 120Hz OLED screens. The Reno 15 Pro could have a 6,000mAh battery, while the standard model could go even bigger.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro, Reno 15 Key Specifications Tipped Ahead of Launch; May Come With 50-Megapixel Telephoto Lens

description: Sony and Microsoft are reportedly working on their respective next-generation consoles. Two separate sources claimed last week that both PS6 and the next Xbox console were targeting a 2027 launch. According to a tipster, the next-gen Xbox would be more powerful that the PlayStation 6, but would also be more expensive.
title: PS6, Next-Gen Xbox Will Reportedly Launch in 2027; Xbox 'Magnus' Said to Be More Powerful, More Expensive

description: Realme GT 8 Pro, developed in collaboration with Ricoh Imaging, will include an ultra-high transparency lens group meeting Ricoh GR standards, Ricoh GR Mode with fast-start interface, signature shutter sound, Snap Mode focus presets, and 28mm and 40mm focal lengths. Users will be able to customise five Classic Ricoh GR Tones and swap the camera island’s design. The phone will also include a 200-megapixel periscope telephoto shooter, a 50-megapixel primary sensor with OIS, and a 50-megapixel ultrawide lens.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro's Ricoh GR Camera Technology Revealed Ahead of Imminent Launch

description: The Redmi K90 Pro is rumoured to be in development as the successor to the Redmi K80 Pro, which debuted last November. The handset has now allegedly surfaced on a benchmarking site, which suggests several of its specifications and also hints towards its impending debut. It is listed with an octa-core SoC, which is expected to be Qualcomm’s new flagship mobile chipset. The phone is listed with 16GB of RAM and is expected to ship with Android 16.
title: Redmi K90 Pro Allegedly Surfaces on Geekbench With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chipset

description: Google on Monday announced new features for NotebookLM to help users better understand complex topics. The company is bringing Nano Banana to Video Overviews, taking advantage of its generation speed, element-based editing, and consistent character. As per the company, there are six new visual styles in Video Overviews, including Anime, Heritage, and Retro Print. Alongside, Google is also rolling out two new formats to generate a detailed summary with the AI feature.
title: Video Overviews in NotebookLM Updated With Google’s Nano Banana AI Model, Six New Visual Styles

description: Windows 10 support will end today (OCtober 14), which means that users have less than a week to make sure that their computers continue to receive updates. While users with a licensed version of Windows 10 can upgrade to Windows 11, the migration will not be possible for those with older computers that are not compatible with the latest version. Here are five things you need to know.
title: Microsoft Ends Windows 10 Support Today: Here are Five Things to Know
